text: Leo Charles Reise, Jr. (June 7, 1922 â€“ July 26, 2015) was a professional ice hockey player in the NHL and son of former pro Leo Reise. He was born in Stoney Creek, Ontario. He won two Stanley Cups with the Detroit Red Wings in 1950 and 1952. Reise died in Ancaster, Ontario from lung cancer at the age of 93. RADLEY: Reise never bragged about his hockey past ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Chicago Blackhawks players Category:Detroit Red Wings players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from Ontario
title: Leo Reise Jr.
